Articles.Content:
Hello there,

I'm setting up my 1.6.1 install, and I'm wondering whether there are any rescaling mods compatible? I'd like to give a 3.2x rescaled system a spin again, but the mod I used in older versions does not seem to be updated anymore.

Thanks,

Michal.don

ReScale 3.2x + Sigma Dimensions + Kronometer + (Kopernicus and other dependencies) still works in 1.6.1 as far as I can tell - i.e. I haven't run into any game-breaking errors yet.

Give it a try.

7 hours ago, Tyko said:

ReScale 3.2x + Sigma Dimensions + Kronometer + (Kopernicus and other dependencies) still works in 1.6.1 as far as I can tell - i.e. I haven't run into any game-breaking errors yet.

It does? That should take care of my rescaling needs, thank you!
